TopicTitle: Heat meter near Kerbonaut when on EVA

Articles.Content: I dont know what mod causes it, but whenever I go EVA there is red heat worning near kerbonaut. Any one encountered this? Any fix?

Not a mod.
If your crew cabin is hot and your Kerbal goes on EVA he inherits that temperature. The cabin has a much higher tolerance than your Kerbal. The temperature gauge indicates your Kerbal (or part) is in danger of overheating. And an overheated Kerbal goes POOF.
